mapper.select: select c.cocktailName as cocktailName from cocktails c left join orderTemp ot on c.cocktailName = ot.menuName group by c.cocktailName order by sum(ot.orderCount) desc

select c.cocktailName from cocktails c inner join taste t on c.cocktailTaste = #{cocktailTaste} or c.cocktailFlavor = #{cocktailFlavor} left join orderTemp ot on c.cocktailName = ot.menuName where t.memberId = #{memberId} group by c.cocktailName order by sum(ot.orderCount) desc
select c.cocktailName as cocktailName from cocktails c left join orderTemp ot on c.cocktailName = ot.menuName where ot.memberId = #{memberId} group by c.cocktailName order by sum(ot.orderCount) desc

select c.cocktailName as cocktailName from cocktails c inner join menuPreference mp on c.cocktailName = mp.menuName left join orderTemp ot on c.cocktailName = ot.menuName where weather in (select cocktailInfo from codeInfo ci where ci.infoName like '%' || #{weather} || '%') group by c.cocktailName order by sum(ot.orderCount) desc

select c.cocktailName as cocktailName from cocktails c inner join menuPreference mp on c.cocktailName = mp.menuName left join orderTemp ot on c.cocktailName = ot.menuName where ageGroup in (select cocktailInfo from codeInfo ci where ci.infoName like '%' || #{ageGroup} || '%') group by c.cocktailName order by sum(ot.orderCount) desc

select c.cocktailName as cocktailName from cocktails c inner join menuPreference mp on c.cocktailName = mp.menuName left join orderTemp ot on c.cocktailName = ot.menuName where companion in (select cocktailInfo from codeInfo ci where ci.infoName like '%' || #{companion} || '%') group by c.cocktailName order by sum(ot.orderCount) desc

select c.cocktailName as cocktailName from cocktails c inner join menuPreference mp on c.cocktailName = mp.menuName left join orderTemp ot on c.cocktailName = ot.menuName where event in (select cocktailInfo from codeInfo ci where ci.infoName like '%' || #{event} || '%') group by c.cocktailName order by sum(ot.orderCount) desc
